org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.item

Class DefaultItemScoreAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.knn.item.DefaultItemScoreAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ItemScoreAlgorithm

    public class DefaultItemScoreAlgorithm
extends Object
implements ItemScoreAlgorithm

    Default item scoring algorithm. It uses up to NeighborhoodSize neighbors to score each item.

      • scoreItems

        public void scoreItems(ItemItemModel model,
              SparseVector userData,
              MutableSparseVector scores,
              NeighborhoodScorer scorer)
        Description copied from interface: ItemScoreAlgorithm

        Score items for a user.

        Specified by:
        scoreItems in interface ItemScoreAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        model - The item-item model.
        userData - The user’s rating data.
        scores - The score vector (key domain is items to score). Unscoreable items will be left unchanged.
        scorer - The scorer to use.
